name: Firefox Menu Button, icon and dropmarker style
description:
!!!There is a newer version of this at "Firefox 4 Menu Button with icon + Tabs in Titlebar" http://userstyles.org/styles/40162 !!!
By selecting the options "No, I only need the modified Firefox Menu Button." and "Yes, (let the Menu Button be modified) all the time." you get a more up to date version of this button. You might even choose one of three logos.

This style modifies the Firefox Menu Button from a text version into a Button version with an icon.
additional_info:
ver.0.4

Based on:
-"Firefox 4 - Move Tabs into Title Bar (Win XP)" by lOtR. http://userstyles.org/styles/36044
-"Maximized Appmenu Button As Tab" by foxxyn8. http://userstyles.org/styles/39724
-"Firefox 4 menu button in Vista/7 style ANIMATED!" by wojtekmaj. http://userstyles.org/styles/35240

This style is tested on Windows XP and 7
This style is tested on Firefox 4.0b7 and 4.0b8pre.

Changes in 0.4:
-Now all new: Firefox Button ANIMATED!

Changes in 0.3:
-Icon in Firefox Menu Button has been replaced. Ther is still an old version. http://userstyles.org/styles/40274
-min-height of button has been decreased to 18px, so it fits into the titlebar of the Win2000 skin. If you liked the overlapping effect, feel free to change in back to 22px.

Changes in 0.2:
-minor graphical fixes in glow effect of the Firefox Menu Button
-changed #appmenu-button-container position from fixed to relative. This comes at cost of less control about the FFButton position, but also places it at the right positions at the edge of the window.
